channel.title: CVE Feed for ELECOM CO.,LTD. -- WAB-I1750-PS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ELECOM CO.,LTD. -- WAB-I1750-PS

item.title: CVE-2024-39300|2024-10-21T13:46:23.712Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wab-i1750-ps
item.description: Missing authentication vulnerability exists in Telnet function of WAB-I1750-PS v1.5.10 and earlier. When Telnet function of the product is enabled, a remote attacker may login to the product without authentication and alter the product's settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-43689|2024-10-21T13:46:18.148Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wab-i1750-ps
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in WAB-I1750-PS and WAB-S1167-PS. By processing a specially crafted HTTP request, arbitrary code may be executed.

item.title: CVE-2024-42412|2024-08-30T14:25:23.164Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wab-i1750-ps
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in WAB-I1750-PS and WAB-S1167-PS due to improper processing of input values in menu.cgi. If a user views a malicious web page while logged in to the product, an arbitrary script may be executed on the user's web browser.

item.title: CVE-2024-39300|2024-08-30T14:32:08.816Z -- elecom%20co.%2Cltd. -- wab-i1750-ps
item.description: Missing authentication vulnerability exists in Telnet function of WAB-I1750-PS v1.5.10 and earlier. When Telnet function of the product is enabled, a remote attacker may login to the product without authentication and alter the product's settings.

item.description: Missing authentication vulnerability exists in Telnet function of WAB-I1750-PS v1.5.10 and earlier. When Telnet function of the product is enabled, a remote attacker may login to the product without authentication and alter the product's settings.

item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in WAB-I1750-PS and WAB-S1167-PS due to improper processing of input values in menu.cgi. If a user views a malicious web page while logged in to the product, an arbitrary script may be executed on the user's web browser.

item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in WAB-I1750-PS and WAB-S1167-PS. By processing a specially crafted HTTP request, arbitrary code may be executed.
